author: Special Correspondent
text: A 16-year-old polytechnic student, K. Subash (16), was found dead with head injuries in a secluded place in Gundanal under Uthappanaickanur police station limits on Thursday. Police said that the boy was doing his first-year diploma in mechanical engineering in Government Polytechnic College at Uthappanaickanur. Hailing from Ambasamudram in Tirunelveli district, he was staying in his uncle’s house in Ezhumalai. Cattle grazers had found the boy lying dead with head injuries around 5 p.m. and alerted the police. The perpetrators of the crime and motive were not known. The body has been sent for post-mortem.
title: Student found dead
